info.name: Volakai
info.description:
This userstyle is in beta. There may be bugs. This is a monokai colorscheme port for Volafile. 3 of the colors used are colors I made up on my own, other than that it's the monokai colors.

"volakai saved my life" - Thallo
"if it aint volakai
then its volashit" - Ollaht
info.additionalInfo:
25th January 2015:
    Styled the music player and other stuff.
    Styled the home page and other shit. I think it's done now.
    Added new color when hovering over the filter reminder.
    Fixed text inside hover menus being very dark.
    Fixed text color.

    Temporarily fixed color for files being uploaded.

26th of January 2015
    Fixed some stuff. Mainly text colors and the Filter Files button.
    Changed the color for buttons (made them darker).

30th of January 2015
    Improved the different color border for highlights.
    Changed the color for highlights.
    Fixed the color for the radio volume bar.

8th of Februrary 2015
    Changed the color of the #overlay element.
